languages.text:
Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.
languages.original_text:
Ульфар дает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}волю{/g} инстинктам Вульфена, и его обуревает гнев.
На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} Ульфара падает до 0, но при этом он получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}.
Когда в этом раунде он каким-либо способом наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} врагу, все противники должны выполнить проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала до конца боя атаки, направленные против них, получают +4% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} и +8% к критическому урону.{br}
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

traits.locale_text:
Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his resolve to 0 for 1 round but gains +20 Strength and Weapon Skill instead.
Every time he deals any damage to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a Willpower resistance test or suffer +4% to critical hit chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
Ulfar entfesselt die Instinkte der Wulfen und verfällt in einen mürrischen Zorn.
Ulfar senkt seine {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} für eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} auf 0, erhält aber stattdessen +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}.
Jedes Mal, wenn er in dieser Runde einem Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, müssen alle Feinde eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} ablegen, da sie ansonsten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +4 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} und +8 % kritischen Schaden gegen eingehende Angriffe erleiden.{br}
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Ulfar entfesselt die Instinkte der Wulfen und verfällt in einen mürrischen Zorn.
Ulfar senkt seine Entschlossenheit für eine Runde auf 0, erhält aber stattdessen +20 Stärke und Waffenfertigkeit.
Jedes Mal, wenn er in dieser Runde einem Gegner Schaden zufügt, müssen alle Feinde eine Willenskraft-Widerstandsprobe ablegen, da sie ansonsten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +4 % kritische Trefferchance und +8 % kritischen Schaden gegen eingehende Angriffe erleiden.{br}
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

languages.text:
Succombant à une colère froide, Ulfar libère les instincts du Wulfen.
Ulfar réduit sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} à 0 pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, mais bénéficie en contrepartie de +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'il inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi au cours de ce round, tous les ennemis doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou subir +4 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} et +8 % de dégâts critiques lors des attaques qui les ciblent jusqu'à la fin du combat.{br}
! Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text:
Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Succombant à une colère froide, Ulfar libère les instincts du Wulfen.
Ulfar réduit sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} à 0 pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, mais bénéficie en contrepartie de +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'il inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi au cours de ce round, tous les ennemis doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou subir +4 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} et +8 % de dégâts critiques lors des attaques qui les ciblent jusqu'à la fin du combat.{br}
! Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text:
乌尔法释放狼人的本能，委身于原始的愤怒。
一整{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，乌尔法的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}降低为0点，但{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高20点。
每当乌尔法在本轮内对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，所有敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。未能通过检定的敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}的几率提高4%，受到的暴击伤害提高8%，效果持续至战斗结束。{br}
！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。
languages.original_text:
Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
乌尔法释放狼人的本能，委身于原始的愤怒。
一整轮内，乌尔法的决心降低为0点，但力量与武器技能提高20点。
每当乌尔法在本轮内对敌人造成伤害时，所有敌人都需要进行意志抗性。未能通过检定的敌人受到暴击的几率提高4%，受到的暴击伤害提高8%，效果持续至战斗结束。{br}
！此效果每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text:
Ulfar desata los instintos del Wulfen, sucumbiendo a una furia sombría.
La {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} de Ulfar se reduce a 0 durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} pero a cambio gana +20 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}.
Cada vez que inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo este asalto, los todos los enemigos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} para evitar que los ataques contra ellos tengan un +4 % a la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} y un +8 % al daño crítico.{br}
! Solo funciona una vez por combate.
languages.original_text:
Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Ulfar desata los instintos del Wulfen, sucumbiendo a una furia sombría.
La firmeza de Ulfar se reduce a 0 durante 1 asalto pero a cambio gana +20 a su Fuerza y Habilidad de armas.
Cada vez que inflige daño a un enemigo este asalto, los todos los enemigos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad para evitar que los ataques contra ellos tengan un +4 % a la probabilidad de impacto crítico y un +8 % al daño crítico.{br}
! Solo funciona una vez por combate.

languages.text:
ウルファーはウルフェンの本能を解き放ち、抑えがたき怒りに屈する。
1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が0になるが、代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}を+20する。
このラウンドに敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える度に、すべての敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。これに失敗した敵は、戦闘終了まであらゆる攻撃から{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+4%され、クリティカルダメージが+8%される。{br}
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
languages.original_text:
Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
ウルファーはウルフェンの本能を解き放ち、抑えがたき怒りに屈する。
1ラウンドの間、自身の決断力が0になるが、代わりに腕力と武器スキルを+20する。
このラウンドに敵にダメージを与える度に、すべての敵は意志力抵抗判定を行わなければならない。これに失敗した敵は、戦闘終了まであらゆる攻撃からクリティカルヒット率が+4%され、クリティカルダメージが+8%される。{br}
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。

languages.text:
Ульфар дает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}волю{/g} инстинктам Вульфена, и его обуревает гнев.
На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} Ульфара падает до 0, но при этом он получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}.
Когда в этом раунде он каким-либо способом наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} врагу, все противники должны выполнить проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала до конца боя атаки, направленные против них, получают +4% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} и +8% к критическому урону.{br}
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.
languages.original_text:
Ulfar unleashes the instincts of the Wulfen, succumbing to a morose anger.
Ulfar reduces his {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to 0 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} but gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead.
Every time he deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy this round, all enemies must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +4% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance and +8% critical damage against incoming attacks until the end of combat.{br}
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Ульфар дает волю инстинктам Вульфена, и его обуревает гнев.
На 1 раунд решимость Ульфара падает до 0, но при этом он получает +20 к Силе и Ближнему Бою.
Когда в этом раунде он каким-либо способом наносит урон врагу, все противники должны проходить проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала до конца боя атаки, направленные против них, получают +4% к шансу критического попадания и +8% к критическому урону.{br}
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

Ульфар дает волю инстинктам Вульфена, и его обуревает гнев.
На 1 раунд решимость Ульфара падает до 0, но при этом он получает +20 к Силе и Ближнему Бою.
Когда в этом раунде он каким-либо способом наносит урон врагу, все противники должны проходить проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала до конца боя атаки, направленные против них, получают +4% к шансу критического попадания и +8% к критическому урону.{br}
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.
